1195940.name: Visual Novel Maker - Kingdoms and Conquest Music Pack
1195940.description:
Fly high with orchestral adventure music for your fantasy games with these twenty tracks from composer Joel Steudler! Rousing themes with bold melodies will urge air pirates into action, set the stage for storming an enemy castle, and bring you home to welcoming towns.


Features:

* 20 music tracks suitable for battle, themes, towns and overworld!
* 10 Music Events (MEs) perfect for victory, defeat or inns!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included for audio assets.
* Royalty free music to use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice.

Tracklist:

Battle - Attack Run
Battle - Breach The Walls
Battle - No Stranger To Danger
Battle - Raiding Party
Battle - Storming The Gates
Field - Heroic Return
Field - Land Of Plenty
Field - Marching To Battle
Field - Overworld Overture
Theme - Air Pirates
Theme - Air Pirates Return
Theme - Fortunes Promised
Theme - Glory Awaits
Theme - Heroes Welcome
Theme - World of Wonders
Town - Air Pirate Hideout
Town - Capital City
Town - Home Hospitality
Town - Idyllic Village
Town - Secret Shrine
